validatePath

public void validatePath()
                  throws ValidatorException
Validates the path explicatily ensuring it follows Linux/Unix path conventions. This is separate form the regular validate method because there was code that needed to check for things like path existence that had to be run after ensuring the path looked ok...

Overrides:
validatePath in class ConfigFileData
Throws:
ValidatorException - if there are any validation errors.
